Step #01, prepare the pdfs
----
1- add the desired pdf files to serch in inside (pdfs) folder
2- run setupData.exe

Step #02, start your search
----
1- run SerchEngineCMD.exe
2- Change the cmd font by going to the top of cmd frame, then click (right-click) -> then select Properties,
-> then Font -> then select font type (Courier New) -> then select Ok. (this is to show arabic text correctly)
3- Search for what you need
4- app will provide you with page number, you can find it in (Search_File.pdf) in the app dir.



Have fun :)
